abstracts.cdata!:
This is a statement by Bassary Toure at
            the meeting of May 23, 2000 concerning the Country
            Assistance Strategy, the Petroleum Development and Pipeline
            Project, the Petroleum Sector Management Capacity Building
            Project for Chad, and the Petroleum Environment Capacity
            Enhancement Project for Cameroon.
